Crimes.Crime_Name: Failure to disclose marital status under Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Was there a breach of procedural fairness due to inadequate reasons for rejecting the applicant's humanitarian and compassionate (H&C) application?
Crimes.Procedural_Context: Judicial review of the decision refusing the applicant's overseas H&C application under s. 25(1) of IRPA
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Applicant failed to request more detailed reasons
Crimes.Decision_Maker: Minister of Immigration, Refugees and Citizenship
Crimes.Review_Outcome: No breach of procedural fairness found
Crimes.Legal_Standard: Reasonableness standard with deference to Minister's discretion
Crimes.Application_Factor: Overseas H&C application subject to more deferential review
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Spouse failed to disclose marriage before becoming a permanent resident
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Allegation of inadequate reasons amounting to procedural unfairness

Crimes.Crime_Name: Misrepresentation under Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Was there a breach of procedural fairness due to inadequate reasons for rejecting the applicant's humanitarian and compassionate (H&C) application?
Crimes.Procedural_Context: Judicial review application filed by Mr. Za'Rour challenging the adequacy of reasons for rejection
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Applicant did not request further details on reasons for refusal
Crimes.Decision_Maker: Minister of Immigration, Refugees and Citizenship
Crimes.Review_Outcome: No breach of procedural fairness found
Crimes.Legal_Standard: Reasonableness standard with deference to Minister's discretion
Crimes.Application_Factor: Overseas H&C application subject to more deferential review
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Rejection based on wife's previous misrepresentation
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Allegation of inadequate reasons amounting to procedural unfairness
